channel.title: Posts on Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Blog

item.title: Ho to publish your own app to Google Play
item.description: Want to publish your own app to Google Play for more people to use? Here is a guide for you.

item.title: Intersection Observer Tutorial
item.description: IntersectionObserver? What is this?

item.title: Prefers-Color-Scheme tutorial
item.description: Dark mode? Many apps supports this feature, now Chrome supports it too from version 76.

item.title: How to Use Svg in React
item.description: It’s common to add image to your application, so how to use it in React?

item.title: Build CDN server with github
item.description: CDN is useful in work or life, but many cdn service is not free. So, let’s build a cdn server with github.

item.title: Check why a package is installed
item.description:
In general, there are lots of packages in node_modules, but only few is wrote to package.json file. Cause these dependencies required other dependencies.

It is necessary to make clear these dependencies’ relation when you want to upgrade package version.

item.title: Add Watermark to Website
item.description: How to add watermark image to your website? It’s pretty simple!

item.title: Lantern Invite Code
item.description:
Use my code GD3BDG and get 3 months free when you sign up!

Download lantern: https://github.com/getlantern/forum

Thank you all guys.

item.title: Add Google Adsense to your website
item.description: Want to add Google Adsense to your website? I’ll tell you how I add it to my website.

item.title: Hugo with i18n
item.description: As a site generator, hugo also support i18n.

item.title: Compile SCSS with Webpack
item.description:
Nowdays, the frameworks supply a whole configs to compile our project.

If you just want to compile .scss file, gulp may help us to do that. But I faced that it can not recognize ~ grammar, so I turn to webpack.
